# suggest_config { #phasic.suggest_config }

```python
phasic.suggest_config(num_particles, particles_per_device=4)
```

Suggest optimal cluster configuration for a given particle count.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

<code>[**num_particles**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[int](`int`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Number of particles for inference

<code>[**particles_per_device**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[int](`int`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [4]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Target particles per device (2-8 recommended)

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

<code>[]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[ClusterConfig](`phasic.cluster_configs.ClusterConfig`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Suggested configuration

## Examples {.doc-section .doc-section-examples}

```python
>>> config = suggest_config(num_particles=128)
>>> print(config)  # Suggests 4 nodes Ã— 8 CPUs = 32 devices
```
